name: UnofficialHowIBuiltThisBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your How I built this. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". 

How I built this with Guy Raz tells the stories behind the world's most successful companies. Guy is a master at weaving the amazing narrative journey about innovators, entrepreneurs and idealists—and the movements they built.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
